The dress is made of soft, light-weight fabric that's comfortable, and customers like its versatility, being able to dress it up or down. They find it flattering, with one mentioning it hits in all the right places, and appreciate its length, with one noting it's long enough to wear heels. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute LBD
items.body: Favorite party dress! Wore to a reunion. So flattering and fit to size. So soft and comfortable. Great material. Read more
items.author: Nikki Brey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Mint Color Won Me Over ‚Äî Compliments All Day Long
items.body: I can‚Äôt even tell you how many compliments I got on this dress. It‚Äôs simple, cute, and somehow still manages to look like you put effort into your outfit. I bought the mint color, and it added the perfect little pop‚Äîfresh, fun, and surprisingly flattering. For sizing reference, I‚Äôm 5'5", 125 lbs, size 4 pants, 36D, and the medium fit perfectly. The top is soft and stretchy, while the bottom has that adorable bubble hem that gives the whole dress a little personality. It moves nicely and isn‚Äôt see-through thanks to the lining. I wore it with sandals, but honestly you could pair it with sneakers, wedges, or even a denim jacket and it would still be cute. I‚Äôm already eyeing more colors because this is one of those easy throw-on-and-go dresses that somehow always works. If you want something comfy, flattering, and effortlessly stylish, this is it. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the dress!
items.body: If you are on the fence about getting this dress, DO IT. I love it so much I even bought it in black. It is so flattering and I got so many compliments on this dress. Also, it has pockets. Need I say more? Material is great and I have washed it numerous times and it‚Äôs still perfect. Nice and light. Not see through. You can dress it up with wedges or make it casual w flats and it looks great either way. Definitely worth every penny. Read more
items.author: CS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute casual dress
items.body: This is a nice casual dress. I love the poof part. It's very creative and gives some nice shape. The bottom is like a smooth cotton sateen type fabric. I didn't wash it so I'm not sure how it would turn out after washing or how you would keep wrinkles out of it. The top is more like a stretchy thin tank top. If you wore it with a jacket or something else it wouldn't matter, but otherwise it definitely brings it down to something quite casual. If the top had cap sleeves and was slightly thicker, I think it would be a much nicer product. I usually wear a medium or around a size 8. This medium fit fine. It is very comfortable and the fabric up top is quite stretchy. Read more
items.author: TN farm girl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles
items.body: This dress is very cute but it wrinkles very easy. Even with ironing it still looks wrinkled. The size is true and the dress is light and comfortable. I love the light blue color. Read more
items.author: Holly Manley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress is amazing! Love it!
items.body: Absolutely adorable, true to size and made so well! This has a great material that feels like it will hold up and not cheaply made. This is so cute wished I bought more when they were on sale. My teen daughter tried it on and loved it so I had to buy another for myself. Read more
items.author: vnamvet6869

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, fabric is nice and light, great length and very flattering, always get compliments! Read more
items.author: marina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable
items.body: It‚Äôs so comfortable and made out of good material. Not see through at all and fit very well. For reference I am 4‚Äô11 & 125 lbs and got a small. Definitely worth the price and it has pockets! I used it for a football game and didn‚Äôt get hot in it either. Read more
items.author: Laila

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Pink, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
